titleInfo.title: Interieur de la mosquée Mehemet Aly Cairo

mods.abstract: Interior of the Great Mosque of Muhammad Ali Pasha or Alabaster Mosque (built between 1828 and 1848) in Cairo, commissioned by Mohammed Ali Pasha in memory of his son illuminated by chandeliers hanging from intricately decorated copulas and ceiling; "Zangaki N 316 Interieur de la mosquee Mehemet Aly Cairo" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

name.namePart: Mosque of Muhammad Ali Pasha (Cairo, Egypt)

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
